question: Which airport get India's First Runway on 'Sea Bridge'?
explanation: Airports Authority of India (AAI) has been given a nod to extend Lakshadweep's Agatti Airport. The task will be carried out by building an RCC platform on the beach and shallow area which will allow bigger ATRs to operate to the island. Agatti could be India's first runway-on-sea bridge.The same plan was considered for Juhu airport in Mumbai and Kullu but, could not be initiated as it wasn't found suitable.
